papers.title: Mondern Algorithms for Garbage Collection.
papers.description: Outlining modern algorithms for garbage collection on the examples of Go and Java

papers.title: Generating Test data for Table driven Tests with different LLMs to evaluate their potential for test automation.
papers.description: Scoring and evaluating the potential of large language models by generating test cases via table driven testing for a rudimentary and a complex example implemented in the Go programming language.
